name: Rotato (nightworks)
description:
This was made for the 2020 GMTK Jam.

Play as a telekinetic potato that spins things out of control.

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move around.

Hold down Z or L to move objects counterclockwise and X or P to move objects clockwise.

The longer you hold, the more the objects spin out of control. When you release, all objects will be shot outwards.

Good luck little rotato!
